nodes.text:
The Copy and Fax Room smells like warm plastic and old approvals.
A copier hums as if it’s being paid by the minute.
On the wall: a service-code sticker stack, layered like sediment.
A fax machine displays LOW TONER with the confidence of a verdict.
A shelf of binder supplies sits within reach, technically.

Hotspots: Copier control panel. Service code sticker stack. Fax machine tray. Binder supplies shelf.
